dict.acceptation: 压（力）；压力；气压（或血压）（的缩略形式）；压（迫）感；
施加压力；迫使；使（机舱等）增压；

sent.orig: Automatic pressure boosting system: The pressure inside can be controlled by automatic pressure adjusting valve.
sent.trans: 自动增压系统：罐内压力由自动压力调节阀控制。

sent.orig: A pressure transmitter monitors that the pressure level is sufficient and a valve prevents excessive pressure.
sent.trans: 用一个压力变送监视器保证足够的压力，用一个安全阀防止过压。

sent.orig: If the pressure builds up excessively, the pressure valve opens to relieve the pressure.
sent.trans: 如果油箱内压力过高，则压力阀开启，以降低压力。

sent.orig: A high-pressure wash water pump boosts raw water pressure the high pressure required for on-line washing.
sent.trans: 高压吹洗水泵把工业水压力提高到在线冲洗所需的压力。

sent.orig: Hydraulic pressure, nozzle pressure and cavity pressure sensing locations are shown in Figure 11.
sent.trans: 光电感应然后就是这个液压式的）液压缸压力、喷嘴压力、模腔压力的感应位置如图11所示。
